cofproject.tau.android.cof

Class CoF

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofproject.tau.android.cof.CoF

  • public class CoF
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the different methods involved with the Co-Occurrence Filter, as described in the original article.
    See Also:
    Co-Occurrence Filter Paper

    • Method Detail

      • quantize

        public static void quantize(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat quantizedIm,
                            int k,
                            double sampleRate)
        This function creates the guidance image for CoF. It samples the input image, and performs k-means clustering for that image. The output image is the guidance image, where instead of a pixel's intensity value there's the cluster index (between 0 to k-1) this pixel is related to.
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image
        quantizedIm - Output image
        k - The number of clusters for the k-means algorithm
        sampleRate - the sample rate of the image - a positive number no larger than 1, determines the percentage of pixels to be sampled from the image.

      • quantize

        public static void quantize(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat quantizedIm)
        An overload for quantize(Mat, Mat, int, double)
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image
        quantizedIm - Output image

      • quantize

        public static void quantize(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat quantizedIm,
                            int k)
        An overload for quantize(Mat, Mat, int, double)
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image
        quantizedIm - Output image
        k - The number of clusters for the k-means algorithm

      • collectPab

        public static void collectPab(org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat maskToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat pab,
                              int nBins,
                              int winSize,
                              double sigma)
        This method gets the guidance image and a mask, and outputs a squared matrix with the co-occurrence statistics. The size of the output matrix is k*k, where k is the number of clusters in the guidance image (produced by quantize) .
        Parameters:
        imToCollect - A guidance image.
        maskToCollect - A binary mask. The statistics will be collected only from non-zero pixels with regards to that mask.
        pab - Output matrix - the co-occurrence matrix.
        nBins - Number of clusters in the guidance image.
        winSize - The co-occurrences are collected within a squared window around a pixel. This parameter determines the size of that window. Namely, that is the size of the window for the Gaussian filter applied in the process.
        sigma - The standard deviation for the Gaussian filter applied in the process.

      • collectPab

        public static void collectPab(org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat maskToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat pab,
                              int nBins)
        An overload for collectPab(Mat, Mat, Mat, int, int, double)
        Parameters:
        imToCollect - A guidance image.
        maskToCollect - A binary mask. The statistics will be collected only from non-zero pixels with regards to that mask.
        pab - Output matrix - the co-occurrence matrix.
        nBins - Number of clusters in the guidance image.

      • collectPab

        public static void collectPab(org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat pab,
                              int nBins,
                              int winSize,
                              double sigma)
        An overload for collectPab(Mat, Mat, Mat, int, int, double). Defaults the statistics collection mask to the all-ones matrix (collecting statistics from the whole image.
        Parameters:
        imToCollect - A guidance image.
        pab - Output matrix - the co-occurrence matrix.
        nBins - Number of clusters in the guidance image.

      • pabToPmi

        public static void pabToPmi(org.opencv.core.Mat pab,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat pmi)
        Performs conversion of co-occurrence matrix (P(a,b) - the output of collectPab(Mat, Mat, int, int, double) to M(a,b) (PMI - Pointwise Mutual Information - normalized CO matrix).
        Parameters:
        pab - input matrix - P(a,b)
        pmi - output matrix - PMI

      • coFilter

        public static void coFilter(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat filteredImage,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat pab,
                            int winSize,
                            double sigma)
        The co-occurrence filter - performs CoF on an input image according to the guidance image and the CO matrix.
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        pab - Co-Occurrence matrix.
        winSize - Window size for the Gaussian filter.
        sigma - Standard deviation for the Gaussian filter.

      • coFilter

        public static void coFilter(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                            org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,

                            org.opencv.core.Mat pab)
        Overload for coFilter(Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, int, double)
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        pab - Co-Occurrence matrix.

      • FBCoFilter

        public static void FBCoFilter(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat filteredImage,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat fgPab,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat bgPab,
                              int winSize,
                              double alpha)
        This method implement the FB-CoF as described in the original paper. It is based on the OpenCV boxFilter, in its un-normalized version. Another variant of this function, using the Gaussian filter, is also available (FBCoFilterGaussian(Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, int, double, double)).
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        fgPab - Foreground co-occurrence statistics.
        bgPab - Background co-occurrence statistics.
        winSize - Window size for the box filter.
        alpha - A weight parameter determines the weight of the image produced from the foreground statistics. The weight of the complementary image (produced from the background statistics) is 1-alpha.
        See Also:
        OpenCV boxFilter

      • FBCoFilter

        public static void FBCoFilter(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat filteredImage,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat fgPab,
                              org.opencv.core.Mat bgPab,
                              int winSize)
        An overload for FBCoFilter(Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, int, double), using a default value for alpha.
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        fgPab - Foreground co-occurrence statistics.
        bgPab - Background co-occurrence statistics.
        winSize - Window size for the box filter.

      • FBCoFilterGaussian

        public static void FBCoFilterGaussian(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat filteredImage,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat fgPab,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat bgPab,
                                      int winSize,
                                      double sigma,
                                      double alpha)
        A variant of the FBCoFilter(Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, int) method, using a Gaussian filter instead of a box filter.
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        fgPab - Foreground co-occurrence statistics.
        bgPab - Background co-occurrence statistics.
        winSize - Window size for the Gaussian filter.
        sigma - Standard deviation for the Gaussian filter.
        alpha - A weight parameter determines the weight of the image produced from the foreground statistics. The weight of the complementary image (produced from the background statistics) is 1-alpha.

      • FBCoFilterGaussian

        public static void FBCoFilterGaussian(org.opencv.core.Mat imToFilter,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat imToCollect,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat filteredImage,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat fgPab,
                                      org.opencv.core.Mat bgPab,
                                      int winSize,
                                      double sigma)
        An overload for FBCoFilterGaussian(Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, Mat, int, double, double), using a default value for alpha.
        Parameters:
        imToFilter - Input image.
        imToCollect - Guidance image.
        filteredImage - Output image.
        fgPab - Foreground co-occurrence statistics.
        bgPab - Background co-occurrence statistics.
        winSize - Window size for the Gaussian filter.
        sigma - Standard deviation for the Gaussian filter.
